multiplechoiceresponse.label: When would you want to import data from templates to a software and use it for managing your project?

choicegroup.choice: If you want to replicate the project structure if you manage software projects that are similar in the structure.
If you want to import data in that you can collaborate and you can get more ideas.
If you want to import things like your task lists.
If you want to validate the status or duplicate data
